_comment_2: In Windows, these policies are stored under HKLM\SOFTWARE\Policies\Google\Chrome\3rdParty\Extensions\<extensionID>\policy
_comment_3: e.g. a REG_DWORD named 'DisableNotifications' with a value of 1 will result in the notifications being disabled.
_comment_4: The extension ID is found in the chrome://extensions or edge://extensions page.

DisableNotifications.title: Disable Notifications
DisableNotifications.description: If set to true, notifications will be disabled.

DisableContextMenu.title: Disable Context Menu
DisableContextMenu.description: If set to true, the context menu will be disabled.

HideContinueButtons.title: Hide Continue Buttons
HideContinueButtons.description: If set to true, the continue buttons will be hidden.

HideReportButton.title: Hide Report Button
HideReportButton.description: If set to true, the report button will be hidden.

LockProtectionOptions.title: Lock Protection Options
LockProtectionOptions.description: If set to true, the protection options will be locked.

DisableClearAllowedSites.title: Disable Clear Allowed Sites
DisableClearAllowedSites.description: If set to true, the clear allowed sites button will be disabled.

IgnoreFrameNavigation.title: Ignore Frame Navigation
IgnoreFrameNavigation.description: If set to true, frame navigation will be ignored.

CacheExpirationSeconds.title: Cache Expiration Seconds
CacheExpirationSeconds.description: If set, the cache expiry time will be set to this value in seconds.

PrecisionSecEnabled.title: PrecisionSec Enabled
PrecisionSecEnabled.description: If set to true, PrecisionSec will be enabled.

BitdefenderEnabled.title: Bitdefender Enabled
BitdefenderEnabled.description: If set to true, Bitdefender will be enabled.

GDATAEnabled.title: G DATA Enabled
GDATAEnabled.description: If set to true, G DATA will be enabled.

SmartScreenEnabled.title: SmartScreen Enabled
SmartScreenEnabled.description: If set to true, SmartScreen will be enabled.

NortonEnabled.title: Norton Enabled
NortonEnabled.description: If set to true, Norton will be enabled.

AdGuardSecurityEnabled.title: AdGuard Security Enabled
AdGuardSecurityEnabled.description: If set to true, AdGuard Security will be enabled.

AdGuardFamilyEnabled.title: AdGuard Family Enabled
AdGuardFamilyEnabled.description: If set to true, AdGuard Family will be enabled.

CERTEEEnabled.title: CERT-EE Enabled
CERTEEEnabled.description: If set to true, CERT-EE will be enabled.

CIRASecurityEnabled.title: CIRA Security Enabled
CIRASecurityEnabled.description: If set to true, CIRA Security will be enabled.

CIRAFamilyEnabled.title: CIRA Family Enabled
CIRAFamilyEnabled.description: If set to true, CIRA Family will be enabled.

CleanBrowsingSecurityEnabled.title: CleanBrowsing Security Enabled
CleanBrowsingSecurityEnabled.description: If set to true, CleanBrowsing Security will be enabled.

CleanBrowsingFamilyEnabled.title: CleanBrowsing Family Enabled
CleanBrowsingFamilyEnabled.description: If set to true, CleanBrowsing Family will be enabled.

CleanBrowsingAdultEnabled.title: CleanBrowsing Adult Enabled
CleanBrowsingAdultEnabled.description: If set to true, CleanBrowsing Adult will be enabled.

CloudflareSecurityEnabled.title: Cloudflare Security Enabled
CloudflareSecurityEnabled.description: If set to true, Cloudflare Security will be enabled.

CloudflareFamilyEnabled.title: Cloudflare Family Enabled
CloudflareFamilyEnabled.description: If set to true, Cloudflare Family will be enabled.

ControlDSecurityEnabled.title: Control D Security Enabled
ControlDSecurityEnabled.description: If set to true, Control D Security will be enabled.

ControlDFamilyEnabled.title: Control D Family Enabled
ControlDFamilyEnabled.description: If set to true, Control D Family will be enabled.

DNS0SecurityEnabled.title: DNS0 Security Enabled
DNS0SecurityEnabled.description: If set to true, DNS0 Security will be enabled.

DNS0KidsEnabled.title: DNS0 Kids Enabled
DNS0KidsEnabled.description: If set to true, DNS0 Kids will be enabled.

OpenDNSSecurityEnabled.title: OpenDNS Security Enabled
OpenDNSSecurityEnabled.description: If set to true, OpenDNS Security will be enabled.

OpenDNSFamilyShieldEnabled.title: OpenDNS Family Shield Enabled
OpenDNSFamilyShieldEnabled.description: If set to true, OpenDNS Family Shield will be enabled.

Quad9Enabled.title: Quad9 Enabled
Quad9Enabled.description: If set to true, Quad9 will be enabled.
